mapper.select: SELECT m_receiver, h_name, h_profile, m_sender, m_roomId, MAX(m_idx) idx FROM host, message WHERE (m_sender=#{sender} AND m_receiver = h_email) OR (m_sender=h_email AND m_receiver = #{sender}) AND m_test=0 GROUP BY h_name ORDER BY idx desc
select m_message, m_send_date from message where m_roomId = #{m_roomId} order by m_idx desc limit 1
SELECT m_receiver, g_name, g_photo, m_sender, m_roomId, MAX(m_idx) idx FROM guest, message WHERE m_sender=g_email AND m_receiver = #{sender} AND m_test=0 GROUP BY g_name ORDER BY idx desc
select IFNULL((select distinct(m_roomId) from message WHERE (m_sender=#{g_email} AND m_receiver=#{h_email}) OR (m_sender=#{h_email} AND m_receiver=#{g_email})), 'none')
mapper.insert: insert into message(m_roomId, m_sender, m_receiver, m_test) values (#{room}, #{g_email}, #{h_email}, 1)
mapper.select: select distinct(m_idx), m_roomId, m_sender, m_receiver, m_message, m_send_date, g_name, g_photo, h_name, h_profile, m_test from message, guest, host where m_roomId=#{m_roomId} AND ((m_sender=g_email and m_receiver=h_email) OR (m_sender=h_email and m_receiver=g_email))

select IFNULL((select DISTINCT(m_receiver) from message WHERE m_sender = #{m_sender} and m_roomId = #{m_roomId}), (select DISTINCT(m_sender) from message WHERE m_receiver = #{m_sender} and m_roomId = #{m_roomId}));
insert into message(m_roomId, m_sender, m_receiver, m_message) values (#{m_roomId}, #{m_sender}, #{m_receiver}, #{m_message})
